name: Pattern (itch)
description:
Welcome to Pattern!

Can you match the pattern?

Four cards are combined to generate a pattern you have to match.  Flip, swap and rotate your cards to make a match.  Cards on the left are on top of the cards on the right.

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Pattern is built using the LÖVE2d framework. It is inspired by the game On the Dot.
Background from www.subtlepatterns.com.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
